name: Food And Drink 44 Quiz | Mixed Food and Drink | 10 Questions

questions.text: Champignons are what type of food?
What are escargots in a French restaurant?
Smuckers gave the world Goober Grape.
Which of the following vegetables has the highest calcium content?
questions.explanation:
Spinach.

	Unfortunately, however, the calcium in spinach can only to a small part be used by the body, so while lower in total calcium content, asparagus actually is the better dietary calcium source.

questions.text: What beef stroganoff ingredient can be sour or whipped?
Red Boudin has what kind of animal's blood in it?
What is a pamplemousse in a French restuarant?
Melted butter with the sediment removed is called ghee.
What salad bar vegetable is related to the loufah sponge?
